name: Press D to Die in Space
name_original: Press D to Die in Space
description:
Run from the oblivious fog to save your species from being forgotten forever. As you run, you grow older and older and get more and more points. However, you also get slower, so at some point you have to pass the torch to a new generation, which has better chance of escaping the oblivious fog.

Game Made for Global Game Jam 2023 (theme: "Roots")

Controls:

[SPACE] - jump

[SPACE] in the air - double jump

[D] - die and give birth to new alien

[ESC] - back to menu

Live long enough to get most points or respawn as a baby alien to move faster - the choice is yours!
